About.paragraph: WE Charity - MN is a branch of WE Charity, an international charity and educational partner. We are dedicated to transforming the lives of those in underdeveloped countries by fundraising to provide them with access to education, clean water, food, quality health, and opportunities.
Why: Our mission is to bring these events to the students at the University of Minnesota who are passionate about making a change and have them hands-on make a positive impact both locally and internationally. We want to raise awareness not only about issues that people face around the world like limited access education and clean water, but also issues that are faced by those in our own community like racism.

Features.title: Water
Features.text: Without water, a community can’t grow. We help communities install hand pumps, boreholes, wells, pipes, hand-washing stations, rain catchment systems and latrines. Clean water gives families the chance to raise healthy children, run sustainable farms and send their girls to school.

Features.title: Education
Features.text: Our education pillar goes beyond school building. We provide teacher training, extracurricular programs, books and basic school supplies so that children can focus on their studies without worrying about absent teachers or a lack of learning materials.

Features.title: Food
Features.text: Nutritious food fuels growing minds and contributes to thriving communities. Made possible by founding partner Nutrition, we help provide school gardens, family farms, nutrition programs, agriculture training, improved seeds and irrigation projects so that communities can achieve long-term health and access stable food sources.

Features.title: Health
Features.text: A healthy community is a sustainable community. When children are healthy, they are less likely to miss school or drop out. And when parents are healthy, their family businesses are more likely to thrive. By offering health training, clinics, medical supplies and workshops to developing communities, we’re empowering families to transform their lives and their communities.

Features.title: Opportunity
Features.text: Entrepreneurship doesn’t just give parents the means to provide for their family—it empowers a generation with new skills that will transform their lives. We help parents, especially mothers, create new economic opportunities through leadership sessions, financial literacy workshops and vocational training.
